title: Manikyam Pachala Kasulaperu Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Seed Pearls. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting radiance. The diamonds are high-quality Cubic Zirconia giving an elegant look.
features: This exquisite Kasulaperu Haaram blends tradition with contemporary design. The necklace features alternating circular motifs, each intricately set with Rubies, Emeralds, and glittering Cubic Zirconia. The central pendant showcases a teardrop design, fully encrusted with gems and adorned with delicate pearl drops. The back of the necklace is finely crafted for comfortable wear. Each motif is designed like a coin which is the hallmark of Kasulaperu Haaram.
colors: Dominant gold with striking contrasts of Ruby red
and the soft luster of Seed Pearls.
occasions: and important family gatherings. A stunning choice for a bride or for a traditional half-saree function (Langa Voni function).
description: This Kasulaperu Haaram is a heritage piece, reimagined for the modern woman. It carries the cultural significance of traditional South Indian jewelry while incorporating a contemporary flair. The combination of precious gemstones, expert craftsmanship, and the auspicious nature of Kasulaperu makes this necklace a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting brilliance and durability.
